short_description: wisconsin granite design is a marble, granite & stone products supplier based in oak creek, wisconsin, united states.
long_description: my name is lena dardha and i am the proud owner of wisconsin granite design located at the heart of business district in oak creek wisconsin. being a women owned business is very challenging but quite rewarding especially in the construction business. our local business is specialized in budget friendly design and installation of granite, quartz, and marble countertops. we offer countertop installation, remodeling, and renovation services for customers throughout wisconsin and illinois! we are experts in delivering beautiful countertops for your residence. let us help you choose the best granite materials. we work with home owners and contractors! contact us: 4147617777 or email at info@wisconsingranitedesign.com

short_description: wisconsin granite design is a marble, granite & stone products supplier based in oak creek, wisconsin, united states.
long_description: we install quartz, marble, & granite for kitchens, bathrooms, and more. we are wisconsin's #1 source for kitchen countertops, renovations, and remodeling. our local business is specialized in budget friendly design and installation of granite, quartz, and marble countertops. we offer countertop installation, remodeling, and renovation services for customers throughout wisconsin and illinois. we are experts in delivering beautiful countertops for your residence. we work with home owners and contractors. marble is elegant, long lasting, and durable. give us a call today to get started. we are wisconsin's top-rated granite countertop sales and installation contractors. we custom fabricate and install numerous stones for residents throughout wisconsin including: granite, marble, and quartz. one of the best in the milwaukee area, wisconsin granite design is known for its wide selection of granite available in shop. our countertop contractors provide professional granite, quartz, and marble install solutions throughout our community and beyond.

generated_description: wisconsin granite design is a local business that specializes in budget-friendly design and installation of granite, quartz, and marble countertops for kitchens, bathrooms, and more. they are wisconsin's top-rated granite countertop sales and installation contractors, with over 145 different selections of granite and marble available in their shop. they also offer a wide selection of quartz options such as silestone, hanstone, caesar stone, and zodiaq. in addition, they provide tile supply and installation services for tile, collaborating with vendors such as daltile, american olean, marazzi, msi, pro cosentino, stonepeak american floor tile, and many more. wisconsin granite designs also offers faucets and sinks from vendors such like artisan, cygnet stainless, blanco, and kohler. they custom fabricate and install numerous stones for residents throughout wisconsin, including granite, marble, and quartz.
